title: ssh-mobile which is second hand mobile resell website.
technology: React, Tailwind, MongoDB, React router, Firebase, useQuery, Vercel, JWT.

details.note: In the Home Page you will see the header , This Is the Most Popular which is advertise section , category section there are three category.
Admin See user seller and report route to access and delete any reported product
There is a advertise section on home page , seller can advertise their product when advertise button click .
Mobile is Separate Category wise If You Choose any Product Which is add to your my order route.
Admin can verify a seller when verify there is a green tick on the verified user.

title: perfect-engineering for individual Online Home Electric Service
technology: React, Tailwind, MongoDB, React router, Firebase, useQuery, Vercel, JWT

details.note: In the Home Page you will see the header , This Is the Most Popular which is advertise section , category section there are three category.
When You Login You Can Show My Review and Add Service Page.
You can comment any text when you log in which is shown in the service page and also shown in my review route here you edit or delete your comment.
There is a add service page where you add any service this is shown when you log in.
All Service Data and Comment Are Show Edit or Delete From Mongodb.

title: top-techedu which is online training base website.
technology: React, Tailwind, MongoDB, React router, Firebase, useQuery, Vercel, JWT.

details.note: In the Home Page left side category  and right side card shown.
when click any category which is shown details page.

Here generate pdf and also premium access to get offer button  generate pdf can download a pdf file and when click premium access button you can redirect to sign in page when sign in the successful message shown.
when login users picture is shown in navbar  when hover show the user name of the navbar
When a user log in sign out button is shown .
